name: HOMEWERKSSmartFan
0:
”Alexa, ask smart fan to run for five minutes.”
”Alexa, ask smart fan to run for five minutes on bathroom.”
”Alexa, turn on bathroom light.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart fan
des:
The Smart fan skill will be used to operate the fan motor and offers the most comprehensive voice controlled smart home experience with Alexa.
including running the fan motor for a specified length of time.
Control your Home Netwerks Smart Fan devices hands free. 
Just say it, Home Netwerks Smart Fan will obey. 

Here's a step by step guide:
(1). Search the Alexa Skills directory for "HOMEWERKS Smart Fan";
(2). Click Enable skill of "HOMEWERKS Smart Fan", then input your Linkplay account username, password on the Account Linking page. You can register the account on Account Linking page or companion app;
(3). Talk to Echo “Alexa, discover devices.”. Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed";
(4). Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices.

For Example:

* Alexa, ask smart fan to run for five minutes.
* Alexa, ask smart fan to run for five minutes on bathroom.
* Alexa, turn on bathroom light
* Alexa, turn off bathroom light
* Alexa, dim bathroom light
* Alexa, brighten bathroom light
* Alexa, set bathroom light to 20 percent
